org.apache.solr.handler

Class SnapShooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.handler.SnapShooter

  • public class SnapShooter
extends Object

    Provides functionality equivalent to the snapshooter script

    This is no longer used in standard replication.
    Since:
    solr 1.4
